## function_createSlider
> **createSlider**(`config`?): [`SliderWidget`](#sliderwidget)

Defined in: [core/src/components/slider/slider.ts:405](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/slider/slider.ts#L405)

Create a slider widget with given config props

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`SliderProps`](#sliderprops)\>

an optional slider config

### Returns

[`SliderWidget`](#sliderwidget)

a SliderWidget

## function_getSliderDefaultConfig

###### value

`number`

value of the handle

`number`

index of the handle in the sorted list

`string`
